security_audit.summary: Pure text-based interactive fiction skill with no executable code, network calls, or file system access. All 27 static findings are false positives from substring matching errors on narrative text and markdown syntax misinterpretation. The 'beacon' references are emergency safety equipment, not malware C2 infrastructure.

content.value_statement: Embark on an interactive sci-fi adventure exploring a mysterious alien cave. Guide astronaut Stella through discoveries of bioluminescent crystals and ancient ruins while making critical choices that shape the story.
actual_capabilities: Interactive storytelling with branching narrative paths
Character role-play as astronaut Stella Chen
Multiple exploration routes with unique discoveries
Crisis management scenarios and survival themes
limitations: Text output only with no visual elements

use_cases.title: Alien exploration story
use_cases.description: Experience an immersive sci-fi adventure on an alien planet through interactive text and character dialogue

use_cases.title: Writing inspiration
use_cases.description: Generate ideas for sci-fi stories, dialogue, and world-building with alien civilizations and environments

use_cases.title: English practice
use_cases.description: Read and interact with engaging English dialogue in a fun adventure context with character interaction

prompt_templates.title: Begin adventure
prompt_templates.prompt: Help Stella explore the cave system. What should she do first at the cave entrance?

prompt_templates.title: Choose path
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella found three cave paths. Left goes up with wind, middle goes down toward water, right has strange markings. What path should she take?

prompt_templates.title: Crisis response
prompt_templates.prompt: The cave is collapsing! Stella is trapped. What should she do to escape safely?

prompt_templates.title: Deep discovery
prompt_templates.prompt: Stella discovered ancient cave carvings that tell the story of an alien civilization. What questions should she ask about this discovery?

output_examples.input: Should Stella enter the cave alone or wait?
output: Stella weighs the risks and her scientific curiosity carefully
She discusses leaving trail markers and checking air quality first
She mentions having emergency protocols ready for safety
She makes a reasoned decision to proceed with proper precautions

output_examples.input: What did Stella find in the cave?
output: Glowing blue-green crystals that emit electromagnetic fields
An underground lake with crystal-clear water
Ancient stone carvings showing an alien civilization story
Evidence of intelligent species that once inhabited the planet

output_examples.input: Tell me about the crisis in the cave
output: A sudden cave-in trapped Stella with rocks falling everywhere
She used systematic searching to find an air flow as escape guidance
She squeezed through narrow passages to reach sunlight
The experience taught her cave exploration requires a partner for safety

best_practices: Guide Stella systematically through each story phase for the full experience
Encourage her scientific reasoning and problem-solving approach during exploration
Support her during crisis moments for emotional story development
anti_patterns: Asking for file operations or system commands that this skill cannot perform
Requesting external data or real-time information outside the story
Expecting persistent state or game progress between different conversations

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for interactive text generation

faq.question: How long does the adventure take?
faq.answer: Each playthrough takes 30-40 minutes through five story phases with multiple outcomes

faq.question: Can choices change the ending?
faq.answer: Yes, exploration paths and crisis choices lead to different story conclusions

faq.question: Is my data stored?
faq.answer: No data is stored. Each conversation is independent with no persistent state

faq.question: Why is text mixed with Chinese?
faq.answer: Stella is a Chinese astronaut who naturally mixes languages in her dialogue

faq.question: How is this different from games?
faq.answer: Pure interactive fiction focused on dialogue and character-driven storytelling
